Lyrics                                   : [00:04.35]You're scared of heights, that's vertigo / [00:06.90]You wanted lights, go see a show / [00:09.59]You ran away, that's touch and go / [00:12.26]You're scared of love, well, aren't we all? / [00:14.88]Well, aren't we all? / [00:18.97]Yeah / [00:20.26]Well, aren't we all? / [00:27.42]I know that you started to feel what I feel / [00:32.63]I could tell 'cause you took my hand by the wheel / [00:38.03]But you couldn't dare to make it real / [00:43.30]Oh, it's such a shame you left it here / [00:48.57]And I wasn't asking for a lifetime / [00:51.22]I was just asking you to take my hand / [00:53.95]Just for a minute or a night / [00:55.79]Was it too much to ask? / [00:57.66]You're scared of heights, that's vertigo / [01:00.29]You wanted lights, go see a show / [01:02.97]You ran away, that's touch and go / [01:05.63]You're scared of love, well, aren't we all? / [01:08.29]You felt alive, that's chemical / [01:10.93]You felt secure, that's called a home / [01:13.61]Couldn't take the heat, that's Mexico / [01:16.18]You're scared of love, well, aren't we all? / [01:18.96]Well, aren't we all? / [01:29.93]I thought that I could be the one to change you / [01:32.60]I thought that I could be the one to prove / [01:35.19]I'm used to fixing broken things before / [01:37.57]I thought maybe I could fix you too / [01:40.48]I wasn't asking for a lifetime / [01:43.38]I was just asking you to take my hand / [01:45.84]For just a minute or a night / [01:47.80]Was it too much to ask? / [01:51.03]You're scared of heights, that's vertigo / [01:53.55]You wanted lights, go see a show / [01:56.23]You ran away, that's touch and go / [01:58.91]You're scared of love, well, aren't we all? / [02:01.55]You felt alive, that's chemical / [02:04.22]You felt secure, that's called a home / [02:06.95]Couldn't take the heat, that's Mexico / [02:09.64]You're scared of love, well, aren't we all? / [02:12.20]Said don't look down / [02:13.68]And then you do / [02:14.95]You put your past on me and you / [02:17.62]Think you got problems, I have too / [02:20.29]You ran from love, that's nothing new / [02:22.88]You're scared of heights, that's vertigo / [02:25.59]You wanted lights, go see a show / [02:28.36]You ran away, that's touch and go / [02:30.98]You're scared of love, well, aren't we all? / [02:33.66]Well, aren't we all? / [02:36.99]Yeah / [02:44.34]You're scared of heights, that's vertigo / [02:47.00]You wanted lights, go see a show / [02:49.64]You ran away, that's touch and go / [02:52.32]You're scared of love, well, aren't we all? / [02:54.92]Well, aren't we all?

Lyrics                                   : [00:00.00]It's a woman's world, and you're lucky to be living in it / [00:07.78]Sexy, confident / [00:11.74]So intelligent / [00:15.74]She is Heaven-sent / [00:19.24]So soft, so strong / [00:23.28]She's a winner, champion / [00:27.28]Superhuman, number one / [00:31.30]She's a sister, she's a mother / [00:35.18]Open your eyes, just look around, and you'll discover you know / [00:39.94]It's a woman's world, and you're lucky to be living in it (Uh-huh, uh-huh) / [00:47.90]It's a woman's world, and you're lucky to be living in it (Uh-huh, uh-huh) / [00:55.15]You better celebrate / [00:59.14]'Cause baby, we ain't going away, oh / [01:03.90]It's a woman's world, and you're lucky to be living in it (Uh-huh, uh-huh) / [01:11.86]Fire in her eyes / [01:15.78]Feminine divine / [01:19.75]She was born to shine / [01:23.35]To shine, to shine, yeah / [01:27.35]She's a flower, she's a thorn / [01:31.32]Superhuman, number one / [01:35.28]She's a sister, she's a mother / [01:39.14]Open your eyes, just look around, and you'll discover you know / [01:43.94]It's a woman's world, and you're lucky to be living in it (Uh-huh, uh-huh) / [01:51.86]It's a woman's world, and you're lucky to be living in it (Uh-huh, uh-huh) / [01:58.40]You better celebrate (Celebrate) / [02:03.14]'Cause baby, we ain't going away, oh / [02:07.88]It's a woman's world, and you're lucky to be living in it (Uh-huh) / [02:13.90]Lucky to be living in it / [02:18.66]Woo! Uh-huh / [02:21.89]Lucky to be living in it / [02:25.38]That's right, it's a woman's world / [02:28.44]Uh-huh / [02:29.46]And you're lucky to be living in it / [02:38.42]Uh-huh
